articles.description: Belgium is home to around 500,000 people of Moroccan descent.
articles.content:
Morocco’s victory was a major upset at the World Cup and was enthusiastically celebrated by fans with Moroccan immigrant roots in many Belgian and Dutch cities.

articles.title: Gautam Gambhir Reacts To Ramiz Raja's "Pakistan Won't Tour India For 2023 ODI World Cup" Comment - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Ramiz Raja made it clear that the Pakistan cricket team will not tour India for the 2023 ODI World Cup if the Indian team doesn't visit them for the Asia Cup next year.

articles.title: Steve Waugh: 'The public has almost overdosed on cricket' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "For the fans and spectators, it is hard to make a connection because you're not sure who is playing"

articles.title: "Fake...Photoshopped": Jay Shah, BCCI face ridicule for tweet on Guinness World Record claim - Janta Ka Reporter
articles.description: BCCI Secretary Jay Shah has once again found himself at the receiving end as netizens ridiculed him for his Guinness World Record claim in connection with an IPL match. Many people alleged the photo of Shah used in the official tweet was fake and photoshopped.
